original_text: You shall have one law for him who does anything unintentionally, for him who is native among the people of Israel and for the stranger who sojourns among them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손 중 본토 소생이든지 그들 중에 거류하는 타국인이든지 누구든 부지중에 범죄한 자에 대한 법이 동일하거니와

sentences.original_text: for him who does anything unintentionally
for him who is native among the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손 중에 있는 본토인을 위하여

sentences.original_text: and for the stranger who sojourns among them.
